Description.Text: Sun Hall Hotel has the best situation on the sea front, overlooking the famous palm tree promenade in Larnaca. The rooms are comfortably equipped with bathroom, satellite TV, telephone, hairdryer, balcony and centrally regulated air conditioning from 01/06 to 15/10.
Located in the very center of the town of Larnaca enjoying a panoramic view to the Palm Trees. Nearest airport: Larnaca International Airport - 7km.
